mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manufactor (name, itemType, insDate) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.select: SELECT manufactor.id, manufactor.name, item_type.name AS itemType, manufactor.insDate FROM manufactor LEFT JOIN item_type ON manufactor.itemType = item_type.id WHERE manufactor.isAlive = 1 GROUP BY manufactor.name
